A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I thought it was aweful. The self-parody and humor was completely off pace (and insults the subtle and beautiful spiritual basis of the film). I think critic reviews are \"corporate fan boy\" cheerleaders. They have the audacity to claim the user reviews are rigged. Pure nonsense. I would rate it negative stars if I could. Its pure junk. Even destroying the beautiful mythology George Lucas created\, the film itself doesn't hold. The visual effects are wonderful\, but that's about it.
